snippet.title: Copa del Rey set for Real-Barca final
snippet.description:
* Barcelona and Real Madrid are on course to meet in the Copa del Rey final for only the second time in 24 years after the great rivals cruised in the opening legs of their semifinals.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/02/05/sport/football/football-real-madrid-barcelona-copa-del-rey/index.html

snippet.title: Atletico Madrid, not Barcelona or Real Madrid, leads La Liga
snippet.description:
* It's rare for Barcelona or Real Madrid not to be leading Spain's La Liga at the Christmas break.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/12/21/sport/football/atletico-madrid-football-spain-liga/index.html

snippet.title: Barcelona and Real Madrid among clubs probed by European Commission
snippet.description:
* Did Real Madrid, FC Barcelona and five other Spanish football clubs get unfair advantage over their rivals through various government support measures potentially worth millions of dollars?
http://www.cnn.com/2013/12/18/sport/football/spanish-football-clubs-investigation/index.html

snippet.title: Barcelona moves further ahead of Real Madrid, Bayern rebounds
snippet.description:
* It has been a good week for Barcelona's Neymar.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/12/14/sport/football/real-madrid-barcelona-bayern-football/index.html

snippet.title: Real Madrid, Barcelona fined $10M over TV rights deal
snippet.description:
* Barcelona and Real Madrid have been fined for breaking Spain's anti-competition laws when agreeing a television deal for their domestic league and cup soccer matches.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/12/02/sport/football/real-madrid-barcelona-fined-football/index.html

snippet.title: Spanish giants kept apart in Champions League semifinals
snippet.description:
* The prospect of arguably the two best club sides in the world contesting the European Champions League final remains a possibility after Spanish giants Barcelona and Real Madrid were kept apart in the semifinal draw in Nyon, Switzerland.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/04/12/sport/football/champions-league-draw/index.html

snippet.title: Messi moves closer to 50-goal milestone
snippet.description:
* Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo warmed up for next week's "Clasico" double-header as Spanish soccer rivals Barcelona and Real Madrid labored to victories on Saturday.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/02/23/sport/football/messi-ronaldo-barcelona-real-madrid-football/index.html

snippet.title: Messi and Ronaldo ensure honors shared in 222nd El Clasico
snippet.description:
* The 222nd El Clasico -- a match between Barcelona and Real Madrid which epitomizes the ultimate in team rivalry -- turned into an individual showcase for the two greatest players in world football and fittingly ended in a 2-2 draw Sunday.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/10/07/sport/football/football-clasico-barcelona-real-madrid/index.html

snippet.title: Will El Clasico decide La Liga title race?
snippet.description:
* Arch rivals Barcelona and Real Madrid meet for the sixth time this season Saturday in an El Clasico clash which is likely to decide the destination of the Spanish title.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/04/20/sport/football/football-el-clasico-real-barcelona/index.html

snippet.title: Barcelona and Real Madrid kept apart in Champions League draw
snippet.description:
* An 'El Clasico' European Champions League final between Spanish giants Real Madrid and Barcelona remains a mouthwatering prospect after the teams were kept apart in the quarterfinal draw.
http://www.cnn.com/2012/03/16/sport/football/football-champions-barcelona-real/index.html
